Package net.sf.structure.cdk.paint

Interface Summary
ColorScheme A color scheme for 2-D molecular rendering.
GraphicsPainter A GraphicsPainter is responsible for providing a graphical representation of a Structure on a Graphics2D context.
ImagePainter A painter capable of creating output onto an java.awt.Image context.
Painter A painter of 2-D molecular representations.
Painter.SettingsExporter An exporter of paint settings.
Painter.SettingsImporter An importer of paint settings.
 

Class Summary
DefaultColorScheme A default implementation of the ColorScheme interface.
DefaultGraphicsPainter A default implementation of the GraphicsPainter interface.
DefaultImagePainter  
SwingPainter A JComponent capable of rendering 2-D molecular representations.
